== Main Inclusion Report for brasero ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/b/brasero, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:'xubuntu CD burner'. We have dropped xfburn which was unmaintained upstream. Brasero is active, working and is a     more or less official GNOME project (svn, bugzilla) . Xubuntu now include libgnome bits if there's no GTK only alternative that is  friendly and usable
# ''Security:''
** No CVE entries.
** No Secunia history.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** Does not open any port.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** No showstopper Debian bugs.
** Good maintenance in Debian, although the Ubuntu package is ahead.
** Active upstream.
** No critical bugs in <nowiki>[[http://bugzilla.gnome.org]]</nowiki>
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Standard packaging, standard patch system.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.
